_improvements: 1. TRAILING STOP LOSS - Locks in profits automatically
3. TIGHTER RISK MANAGEMENT - Max 1% loss per trade
4. FASTER MODE SWITCHING - 3s cooldown for quick adaptation
5. RALLY BREAKOUT MODE - Special mode for strong trends
_comment_usdt: All capital in USDT - futures style (no BTC exposure when flat)
_comment_btc: 0 BTC - prevents currency risk, matches real futures trading
_comment_quantity: 0.01 BTC = ~$1000 position @ $100k BTC (10% of capital). With 0.7% TP = $7 profit, 1% max loss = $10 (0.1% of account)
_comment_tp: 0.7% TP - OPTIMIZED from data analysis (95th percentile move, best return -3.98%)
_comment_max_loss: REDUCED from 1.5% to 1% - tighter risk control
_comment_trailing_stop: NEW: Activate trailing stop after +0.5% profit
_comment_trailing_distance: Trail 0.3% behind peak - locks in gains
_comment_max_hold: REDUCED from 1800s to 1200s (20 min) - faster exits
_comment_window: REDUCED from 50 to 30 - faster trend detection
_comment_threshold: LOWERED from 0.50 to 0.45 - easier to switch modes
_comment_hysteresis: REDUCED from 0.05 to 0.03 - less sticky modes
_comment_momentum_threshold: Switch to RALLY mode when trend_strength > 0.75
_comment_rally_mult: Increase position size by 50% during strong trends
_comment_time_filter: Disabled - trade 24/7 to catch all rallies
_comment_step_losses: REDUCED from 2 to 1 - reduce size faster
_comment_max_losses: Pause trading after 3 losses in a row
_comment_daily_limit: Stop trading if down 5% for the day
_comment_profit_lock: NEW: Lock in 50% of daily profits at EOD
_comment_poll_sec: Trading decisions every 5s - reduces overtrading, sustainable for live trading
_comment_graph_update: Graph updates every 0.5s - keeps visualization smooth while trading logic is slower
_comment_min_entry_time: Minimum 30 seconds between opening new positions - prevents rapid-fire entries
_comment_min_hold_time: CRITICAL: Minimum 60s hold time per position - lets scaling strategy work properly. Prevents exits before scale in/out can execute. EXCEPTIONS that override hold time: 1) Max loss protection, 2) TP reached (meaningful profit), 3) Position almost fully scaled out (<10% remaining). Normal exits (L-cross) must wait for hold time.
